    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, java.net.Socket socket, java.io.ObjectOutputStream o, java.io.ObjectInputStream i)
      To add a player in the lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the new player
      socket - The socket object coming from the initial connection to the server
      o - The ObjectOutputStream related to the socket
      i - The ObjectInputStream related to the socket
      Returns:
      True if the player is added to the lobby, false otherwise.
